name: Fletcher's Puzzle
description:
Left-click with the mouse and drag the puzzle piece to the correct slot.

There are a few hints given in grey as the puzzle is quite difficult.

The puzzle itself is based on a piece of artwork called "Kama Sutra" by Alan Fletcher: https://www.alanfletcherarchive.com/archive/limited-edition-print-kama-sutra

I enjoyed the way that the paint strokes fit together like a puzzle and thought it would work well as a relaxed puzzle game.
